definition[0]: remaining after a process, event etc is finished
note[0]: residual income (=the money left from what you earn after you have paid your taxes)
example[0]: the residual effects of drug treatment
definition[1]: the amount of money or assets left after all taxes or other necessary payments have been made
example[1]: the right to any residual assets on the liquidation of the company
definition[2]: money that someone gets because work that they did previously continues to produce income, for example money that a writer or actor gets when their work is broadcast again
